A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Everyone gives The Force Awakens such a hard time for being a riff of A New Hope\, this is just alternate versions of scenes from Empire and Jedi. Its like the director had favorite scenes and thought hey wouldn't it be cool if they did it this way and then set out making that into a movie. 

This movie made Awakens seem original and fresh. This was the first Star Wars movie that when I walked out of the theater I had no desire whatsoever to see the next one. 

Also they did not show a preview for the Han Solo movie that is right around the corner\, thats got to be a bad sign\, and there are a couple of pretty good actors that look a lot like a young Harrison Ford but they went with a guy who looks nothing like him WTF!
